title: Quick Qestion please help!
body:
Have a quick question regarding the new Championship missions. 

if you get 320 Mission points, you can unlock the Golden Championship Ashe Chroma and ward.

What if you don't have the championship Ashe skin? Does it automatically unlock? Or do you have to first buy the skin to unlock the Golden Chroma? Need help before I spend the mission points on it...please and thank you!

replies.body: You do still need to buy the Championship Ashe skin before you'll be able to use that chroma!
